_sText:
[THIS IS A CSGO PORT FOR CSS]

Intended for competitive and casual defusal mode.

  Terrorists are trying to destroy the antique and valuable ruins of a lost civilization somewhere in central / south America, Seal team 6 has been deployed to stop them. 

Includes two bomb sites.
Includes a  proper Mini-map (Ported panorama mini-map)
Includes Nav_mesh
Fully textured and clipped
Removes a lot of trees on low video settings (To support ancient potato machines)

This port does not include all features from its CSGO counterpart, due to CSS limitations. Therefore, some features and graphical changes have been made/removed. 

Changes in this port:
No dynamic lighting
Removed some CSGO detail props due to unfix-able lighting glitches regarding the models.
Not so perfect map lighting, due to engine not allowing me to push it more.
Less props.

About the lighting:

I did my best to make it so the overall level lighting looks similar to its CSGO counterpart, but alas i cannot make it any better than this. I also recompiled every single texture in the map with proper .vtf versions. Can be played in CSGO, although i do NOT recommend it as the original is far superior.

Csgo counterpart can be found here: https://gamebanana.com/maps/206072 or https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1809308995
